gt_text: Time to refresh your space Fresh Start Spring Sale Up to 40% off cleaning & home goods Make room for joy Eco-friendly picks included
juding_criteria:
Here is a list of every concrete visual element the final image must contain:

*   Title text: “Fresh Start Spring Sale”
*   Title style: mint green bubble letters
*   Title position: at the top
*   Caption text: “Time to refresh your space.”
*   Caption style: small, light gray text
*   Caption position: above the title
*   Pink speech bubble
*   Speech bubble text: “Up to 40% off cleaning & home goods.”
*   Speech bubble position: below the title
*   A person
*   Person opening a window
*   Sunlight streaming in (from the window)
*   A shelf
*   Cleaning supplies (on the shelf)
*   Potted plants (on the shelf)
*   Folded towels (on the shelf)
*   Neatly arranged items on the shelf
*   Brand logo
*   Brand logo position: top right corner
*   Bottom text element 1: “Make room for joy”
*   Bottom text element 2: “Eco-friendly picks included”
*   Promo bar (at the bottom)
*   Discount code (on the promo bar)
